SELECT r.inspection_id AS taskId, o.order_no AS orderNo, p.product_name, pd.process_name, qi.inspection_name AS inspectionItems, r.inspection_result AS taskStatus, r.inspection_time FROM quality_inspection_record r JOIN production_order o ON r.order_id = o.order_id JOIN product p ON o.product_id = p.product_id JOIN production_record pr ON r.record_id = pr.record_id JOIN process_definition pd ON pr.process_id = pd.process_id JOIN quality_inspection_item qi ON r.item_id = qi.item_id
AND o.order_no LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dto.orderNo}, '%')
AND p.product_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dto.productName}, '%')
AND pd.process_name = #{dto.processName}
AND qi.inspection_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dto.inspectionItem}, '%')
AND r.inspection_result = #{dto.taskStatus}
ORDER BY r.inspection_time DESC
